hero.title: Tech student
hero.description: Passionate about backend development with Java and Spring Boot. Currently expanding into frontend with React. Always focused on writing clean, maintainable code and learning something new every day.

about.title: About Me
about.description: My name is Paulo Rodrigues, a student in System Analysis and Development in Brazil — a program similar to Computer Systems Technology degrees in the US and Canada. I began my journey in tech in 2023 through self-learning and started college in 2024. I'm passionate about backend development, particularly with Java and Spring Boot, and I'm currently learning React to grow as a full stack developer. I'm eager to keep learning, build meaningful projects, and I'm actively seeking an internship opportunity to launch my career in software development.
